DiscrepancyNoteAction.Message: Date of Birth should not occur after the Date of Consent or after to the year 1970. Please verify your response.
If 'Prefer not to answer' or 'Unknown' is selected, then no other options should be selected. Please verify your response.
The Date of Informed Consent is different than the Date of Informed Consent recorded in the Inclusion/Exclusion and/or the Verification of Informed Consent form. Please verify your response.

RuleDef.Name: Demographics: DOB Verification
RuleDef.Description: Date of Birth cannot occur after the Date of Consent and must be prior to 1970

RuleDef.Name: Demographics: Race Unknown
RuleDef.Description: No other selections should be made if 'Unknown' is selected for race.
RuleDef.Expression: (I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "9" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "8") and (I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "1" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "2" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "3" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "4" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "5" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "6" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "7" or I_DEMOG_DEM_RACE ct "10")

RuleDef.Name: Demographics: Date of IC vs Inc/Ex and Verification of IC forms
RuleDef.Description: Date of Informed Consent should be the same as the Date of Informed Consent recorded in the Inclusion/Exclusion form.
